com.samskivert.util

Class Predicate.And<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samskivert.util.Predicate<T>
      • com.samskivert.util.Predicate.And<T>
  • Enclosing class:
    Predicate<T>

    public static class Predicate.And<T>
extends Predicate<T>
    Includes an object if and only if all the predicates with which it was constructed also include the object. The predicates are tested in the order specified and testing is halted as soon as one does not include the object. If the Predicate is constructed with no arguments, it will behave like TRUE.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.samskivert.util.Predicate
